name: Steel Dance
description:
This is a game I developed in last years quarantine, almost finished it and then forgot about it. So after polishing it somewhat I decided to upload the finished result.
The color palette used is strictly the C64 colors as the washed out colors fit the aesthetics much better. Currently there is no music because i have no idea how to make any.

The game is a combat platformer where u take the role of a ninja fighting trough. demon hordes in order to save your dying land.

Controls> (The game supports, Xinput, Direct input and Keyboard controls.

Feedback and Criticism is always welcome.

Have fun.
